short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small tool can import web page content into Obsidian

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Obsidian web clipping tool; it imports text and images from web pages into the Obsidian software. After installing the plugin and enabling the feature, two options will be added to the right-click menu: 1. Import entire page, 2. Clip import. Clicking on these options will attempt to launch the Obsidian software. After the user agrees, the web page content will automatically be pasted into Obsidian
